name: Task Dashboard Notion Template
description: Our Task Dashboard Notion template is the perfect way to keep track of your tasks and to-do list! This Notion template is for those who want a simple but practical approach to task management and staying on top of your to-do list. We created and use this template ourselves and it has been a great help in managing our day to day tasks.Key features in our template are: Monthly check-inMy tasks at a glanceMy today to-do list Click here for a detailed tutorial.
features: Monthly check-in; My tasks at a glance; My today to-do list
